00254     /**
00255      * 
00256      */
00257     public function __construct()
00258     {
00259         $this->_moduleClass = get_class( $this );
00260         
00261         $this->_reflection = new ReflectionObject( $this );
00262         
00263         if( !self::$_hasStatic ) {
00264             
00265             self::_setStaticVars();
00266         }
00267         
00268         $this->_backPath = $GLOBALS[ 'BACK_PATH' ];
00269         
00270         $this->_modVars = t3lib_div::_GP( $this->_moduleClass );
00271         
00272         foreach( $this->include_once as $includeFile ) {
00273             
00274             require_once( $includeFile );
00275         }
00276         
00277         $this->_moduleName    = $GLOBALS[ 'MCONF' ][ 'name' ];
00278         $this->_moduleNumber  = substr( $this->_moduleName, -1 );
00279         $this->_moduleSection = substr( $this->_moduleName, 0, strpos( $this->_moduleName, '_' ) );
00280         
00281         $extPathInfo = explode( DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $this->_reflection->getFileName() );
00282         
00283         array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00284         array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00285         
00286         $this->_extKey             = array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00287         
00288         $this->_extPath            = t3lib_extMgm::extPath( $this->_extKey );
00289         
00290         $this->_extRelativePath    = t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath( $this->_extKey );
00291         
00292         $this->_modulePath         = $this->_extPath . 'mod' . $this->_moduleNumber;
00293         
00294         $this->_moduleRelativePath = $this->_extRelativePath . 'mod1/';
00295         
00296         $this->_uploadDirectory    = str_replace(
00297             PATH_site,
00298             '',
00299             t3lib_div::getFileAbsFileName( 'uploads/tx_' . str_replace( '_', '', $this->_extKey ) . '/' )
00300         );
00301         
00302         $this->_lang               = tx_oop_Lang_Getter::getInstance( 'EXT:' . $this->_extKey . '/lang/mod' . $this->_moduleNumber . '.xml' );
00303         
00304         $this->_content            = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'div' );
00305     }
00306     
00307     /**
00308      * 
00309      */
00310     public function __toString()
00311     {
00312         $content                = '';
00313         $markers                = array();
00314         $markers[ 'CONTENT' ]   = ( string )$this->_content;
00315         $markers[ 'FUNC_MENU' ] = t3lib_BEfunc::getFuncMenu(
00316             $this->id,
00317             'SET[function]',
00318             $this->MOD_SETTINGS[ 'function' ],
00319             $this->MOD_MENU[ 'function' ]
00320         );
00321         
00322         $content                = $this->doc->startPage( $this->_lang->title )
00323                                 . $this->doc->moduleBody( $this->_pageInfos, $this->_buttons, $markers )
00324                                 . $this->doc->endPage();
00325         
00326         return $this->doc->insertStylesAndJS( $content );
00327     }

00329     /**
00330      * 
00331      */
00332     private static function _setStaticVars()
00333     {
00334         self::$_db        =  tx_oop_Database_Layer::getInstance();
00335         self::$_t3Db      =  $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_DB' ];
00336         self::$_t3Lang    =  $GLOBALS[ 'LANG' ];
00337         self::$_beUser    =  $GLOBALS[ 'BE_USER' ];
00338         self::$_tcaDescr  =& $GLOBALS[ 'TCA_DESCR' ];
00339         self::$_tca       =& $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ];
00340         self::$client     =& $GLOBALS[ 'CLIENT' ];
00341         self::$_t3Conf    =& $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_CONF_VARS' ];
00342         self::$_NL        =  chr( 10 );
00343         self::$_TAB       =  chr( 9 );
00344         self::$_hasStatic =  true;
00345     }

00347     /**
00348      * 
00349      */
00350     private function _addJs( $path )
00351     {
00352         $js                 = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'script' );
00353         $js[ 'type' ]       = 'text/javascript';
00354         $js[ 'charset' ]    = 'utf-8';
00355         $js[ 'src' ]        = $this->_backPath . $this->_extRelativePath . $path;
00356         
00357         $this->doc->JScode .= self::$_NL . $js;
00358     }
00359     
00360     /**
00361      * Creates a thumbnail
00362      * 
00363      * @param   string  $file       The file path (relative to the upload directory)
00364      * @param   int     $width      The thumbnail maximum width
00365      * @param   int     $height     The thumbnail maximum height
00366      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The thumbnail picture
00367      */
00368     protected function _createThumbnail( $file, $width = 100, $height = 100 )
00369     {
00370         // Gets the file absolute path
00371         $fileAbsPath  = PATH_site . $this->_uploadDirectory . $file;
00372         
00373         // Security check
00374         $fileCheck    = basename( $fileAbsPath)
00375                       . ':'
00376                       . filemtime( $fileAbsPath )
00377                       . ':'
00378                       . self::$_typo3ConfVars[ 'SYS' ][ 'encryptionKey' ];
00379         
00380         
00381         // URL that will generate the thumbnail
00382         $url          = self::$_backPath
00383                       . 'thumbs.php?size='
00384                       . $width
00385                       . 'x'
00386                       . $height
00387                       . '&file='
00388                       . rawurlencode( '../' . self::$_uploadDirectory . $file )
00389                       . '&md5sum='
00390                       . t3lib_div::shortMD5( $fileCheck );
00391         
00392         // Creates the image tag
00393         $img          = tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'img' );
00394         $img[ 'src' ] = htmlspecialchars( $url );
00395         $img[ 'alt' ] = $file;
00396         
00397         // Returns the thumbnail
00398         return $img;
00399     }
00400     
00401     /**
00402      * Creates a link with module variables
00403      * 
00404      * @param   string  $text           The link text
00405      * @param   array   $params         The module variables to set, as key/value pairs
00406      * @param   array   $keepModVars    The module variables to keep
00407      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag        The link
00408      */
00409     protected function _link( $text, array $params = array(), $keepModVars = false )
00410     {
00411         // Base url
00412         $url = ( $keepModVars ) ? t3lib_div::linkThisScript( array( $this->_moduleName => $this->_modVars ) ) : t3lib_div::linkThisScript();
00413         
00414         // Process each parameter
00415         foreach( $params as $key => $value ) {
00416             
00417             // Adds the current parameter
00418             $url .= '&' . $this->_moduleName . '[' . $key . ']=' . $value;
00419         }
00420         
00421         // Creates the full link
00422         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00423         $link[ 'href' ]    = $url;
00424         
00425         // Adds the linked text
00426         $link->addTextData( $text );
00427         
00428         // Returns the link
00429         return $link;
00430     }
00431     
00432     /**
00433      * Creates a link to a function of the menu
00434      * 
00435      * @param   string  $text       The link text
00436      * @param   int     $function   The menu function ID
00437      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The link
00438      */
00439     protected function _functionLink( $text, $function )
00440     {
00441         // Creates the URL
00442         $url = t3lib_div::linkThisScript(
00443             array(
00444                 'SET' => array(
00445                     'function' => $function
00446                 )
00447             )
00448         );
00449         
00450         // Creates the full link
00451         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00452         $link[ 'href' ]    = $url;
00453         
00454         // Adds the linked text
00455         $link->addTextData( $text );
00456         
00457         // Returns the link
00458         return $link;
00459     }
00460     
00461     /**
00462      * Creates a link to the edit view of a record
00463      * 
00464      * @param   string  $table      The table name
00465      * @param   int     $uid        The ID of the record
00466      * @param   string  $text       The link text
00467      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The link
00468      */
00469     protected function _editLink( $table, $uid, $text )
00470     {
00471         // On click action
00472         $onClick = t3lib_BEfunc::editOnClick(
00473             '&edit[' . $table . '][' . $uid . ']=edit',
00474             $this->_backPath
00475         );
00476         
00477         // Creates the full link
00478         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00479         $link[ 'href' ]    = '#';
00480         $link[ 'onclick' ] = htmlspecialchars( $onClick );
00481         
00482         // Adds the linked text
00483         $link->addTextData( $text );
00484         
00485         // Returns the link
00486         return $link;
00487     }
00488     
00489     /**
00490      * Gets an icon from the extension
00491      * 
00492      * @param   string  $name       The icon name
00493      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The image tag
00494      */
00495     protected function _skinImg( $name )
00496     {
00497         // Gets the file absolute path
00498         $fileAbsPath = $this->_extPath
00499                      . 'res/img/'
00500                      . $name;
00501         
00502         // Checks if the requested file exists
00503         if( file_exists( $fileAbsPath ) && is_readable( $fileAbsPath ) ) {
00504             
00505             // Gets the image size
00506             $size   = getimagesize( $fileAbsPath );
00507             
00508             // Creates the image tag
00509             $img             = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'img' );
00510             $img[ 'src' ]    = $this->_backPath . $this->_extRelativePath . 'res/img/' . $name;
00511             $img[ 'width' ]  = $size[ 0 ];
00512             $img[ 'height' ] = $size[ 1 ];
00513             $img[ 'alt' ]    = $name;
00514             $img[ 'hspace' ] = '0';
00515             $img[ 'vspace' ] = '0';
00516             $img[ 'border' ] = '0';
00517             $img[ 'align' ]  = 'middle';
00518             
00519             // Returns the image tag
00520             return $img;
00521         }
00522         
00523         // File not found
00524         return '';
00525     }
00526     
00527     /**
00528      * Gets an icon from TYPO3
00529      * 
00530      * @param   string  $name       The icon name
00531      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The image tag
00532      */
00533     protected function _t3SkinImg( $name )
00534     {
00535         // Gets the image source
00536         $imgSrc = t3lib_iconWorks::skinImg( $this->_backPath, $name, '', 1 );
00537         
00538         // Gets the file absolute path
00539         $fileAbsPath = $GLOBALS[ 'TBE_STYLES' ][ 'skinImgAutoCfg' ][ 'absDir' ] . $name;
00540         
00541         // Checks if the requested file exists
00542         if( file_exists( $fileAbsPath ) && is_readable( $fileAbsPath ) ) {
00543             
00544             // Gets the image size
00545             $size   = getimagesize( $fileAbsPath );
00546             
00547             // Creates the image tag
00548             $img             = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'img' );
00549             $img[ 'src' ]    = $imgSrc;
00550             $img[ 'width' ]  = $size[ 0 ];
00551             $img[ 'height' ] = $size[ 1 ];
00552             $img[ 'alt' ]    = $name;
00553             $img[ 'hspace' ] = '0';
00554             $img[ 'vspace' ] = '0';
00555             $img[ 'border' ] = '0';
00556             $img[ 'align' ]  = 'middle';
00557             
00558             // Returns the image tag
00559             return $img;
00560         }
00561         
00562         // File not found
00563         return '';
00564     }
00565     
00566     /**
00567      * 
00568      */
00569     protected function _addButton( $name, $file, $fromSkin = true )
00570     {
00571         // Creates the button image
00572         $img = ( $fromSkin ) ? $this->_t3SkinImg( $file ) : $this->_skinImg( $file );
00573         
00574         // URL
00575         $url = t3lib_div::linkThisScript( array( $this->_moduleName => array( 'actions' => array( $name => true ) ) ) );
00576         
00577         // Creates the full link
00578         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00579         $link[ 'href' ]    = $url;
00580         
00581         // Adds the button image
00582         $link->addTextData( $img );
00583         
00584         // Adds the button
00585         $this->_buttons[ $name ] = $link;
00586     }
00587     
00588     /**
00589      * Gets the CSM menu for a record
00590      * 
00591      * This method creates an icon of the requested record with a
00592      * Context Sensitive Menu (CSM).
00593      * 
00594      * @param   string  The table of the record
00595      * @param   array   The record's row
00596      * @return  string  The icon with a CSM menu link
00597      */
00598     protected function _recordIcon( $table, $row )
00599     {
00600         // Ensures the record's row is an array (may be an stdClass object)
00601         $row = ( array )$row;
00602         
00603         // Gets the record icon
00604         $icon = t3lib_iconWorks::getIconImage(
00605             $table,
00606             $row,
00607             $this->_backPath
00608         );
00609         
00610         // Returns the icon with the CSM link
00611         return $this->doc->wrapClickMenuOnIcon(
00612             $icon,
00613             $table,
00614             $row[ 'uid' ],
00615             1
00616         );
00617     }
00618     
00619     protected function _editIcon( $table, $id )
00620     {
00621         $icon              = $this->_t3SkinImg( 'gfx/edit2.gif' );
00622         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00623         $link[ 'href' ]    = '#';
00624         $link[ 'onclick' ] = htmlspecialchars(
00625             t3lib_BEfunc::editOnClick(
00626                 '&edit[' . $table . '][' . $id . ']=edit',
00627                 $this->_backPath
00628             )
00629         );
00630         
00631         $link->addTextData( $icon );
00632         
00633         return $link;
00634     }
00635     
00636     protected function _infoIcon( $table, $id )
00637     {
00638         $icon              = $this->_t3SkinImg( 'gfx/zoom2.gif' );
00639         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00640         $link[ 'href' ]    = '#';
00641         $link[ 'onclick' ] = 'top.launchView( \''
00642                            .  $table
00643                            .  '\', \''
00644                            .  $id
00645                            .  '\' ); return false;';
00646         
00647         $link->addTextData( $icon );
00648         
00649         return $link;
00650     }
00651     
00652     protected function _deleteIcon( $table, $id, $confirmDialog = true )
00653     {
00654         $icon              = $this->_t3SkinImg( 'gfx/garbage.gif' );
00655         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00656         $link[ 'href' ]    = htmlspecialchars(
00657             $this->doc->issueCommand(
00658                 '&cmd[' . $table . ']['. $id .'][delete]=1'
00659             )
00660         );
00661         
00662         if( $confirmDialog ) {
00663             
00664             $link[ 'onclick' ] = htmlspecialchars(
00665                 'return confirm( \''
00666               . self::$_t3Lang->sL( 'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_alt_doc.xml:deleteWarning' )
00667               . '\' );'
00668             );
00669         }
00670         
00671         $link->addTextData( $icon );
00672         
00673         return $link;
00674     }

00676     /**
00677      * 
00678      */
00679     protected function _checkAction( $name )
00680     {
00681         return isset( $this->_modVars[ 'actions' ][ $name ] );
00682     }
00683     
00684     /**
00685      * Includes the jQuery JS framework
00686      * 
00687      * @return  NULL
00688      */
00689     protected function _includeJQuery()
00690     {
00691         // Only includes the script once
00692         if( self::$_hasJQuery === false ) {
00693             
00694             // Adds the JS script
00695             $this->_addJs( 'jquery/jquery.js' );
00696             
00697             // Script has been included
00698             self::$_hasJQuery = true;
00699         }
00700     }
00701     
00702     /**
00703      * Includes the jQuery UI JS framework
00704      * 
00705      * @return  NULL
00706      */
00707     protected function _includeJQueryUi()
00708     {
00709         // Only includes the script once
00710         if( self::$_hasJQueryUi === false ) {
00711             
00712             // Adds the JS script
00713             $this->_addJs( 'jquery-ui/jquery-ui.js' );
00714             
00715             // Script has been included
00716             self::$_hasJQueryUi = true;
00717         }
00718     }
00719     
00720     /**
00721      * Includes the Mootools JS framework
00722      * 
00723      * @return  NULL
00724      */
00725     protected function _includeMootools()
00726     {
00727         // Only includes the script once
00728         if( self::$_hasMootools === false ) {
00729             
00730             // Adds the JS script
00731             $this->_addJs( 'mootools/mootools.js' );
00732             
00733             // Script has been included
00734             self::$_hasMootools = true;
00735         }
00736     }
00737     
00738     /**
00739      * Includes the Prototype JS framework
00740      * 
00741      * @return  NULL
00742      */
00743     protected function _includePrototype()
00744     {
00745         // Only includes the script once
00746         if( self::$_hasPrototype === false ) {
00747             
00748             // Adds the JS script
00749             $this->_addJs( 'prototype/prototype.js' );
00750             
00751             // Script has been included
00752             self::$_hasPrototype = true;
00753         }
00754     }
00755     
00756     /**
00757      * Includes the Scriptaculous JS framework
00758      * 
00759      * @return  NULL
00760      * @see     _includePrototype
00761      */
00762     protected function _includeScriptaculous()
00763     {
00764         // Only includes the script once
00765         if( self::$_hasScriptaculous === false ) {
00766             
00767             // Includes the Prototype JS framework
00768             $this->_includePrototype();
00769             
00770             // Adds the JS script
00771             $this->_addJs( 'scriptaculous/scriptaculous.js' );
00772             
00773             // Script has been included
00774             self::$_hasScriptaculous = true;
00775         }
00776     }
00777     
00778     /**
00779      * Includes a Webtoolkit script
00780      * 
00781      * Available scripts are:
00782      * - base64
00783      * - crc32
00784      * - md5
00785      * - sha1
00786      * - sha256
00787      * - url
00788      * - utf8
00789      * 
00790      * @param   string  The name of the script to include
00791      * @return  NULL
00792      */
00793     protected function _includeWebtoolkitScript( $script )
00794     {
00795         // Only includes the script once
00796         if( !isset( self::$_webtoolkitLoadedScripts[ $script ] ) ) {
00797             
00798             // Adds the JS script
00799             $this->_addJs( 'webtoolkit/' . $script . '.js' );
00800             
00801             // Script has been included
00802             self::$_webtoolkitLoadedScripts[ $script ] = true;
00803         }
00804     }
00805     
00806     /**
00807      * Includes a jQuery plugin
00808      * 
00809      * Available plugins are:
00810      * - accordion
00811      * - dimensions
00812      * 
00813      * @param   string  The name of the plugin to include
00814      * @return  NULL
00815      */
00816     protected function _includeJQueryPlugin( $plugin )
00817     {
00818         // Only includes the script once
00819         if( !isset( self::$_jQueryLoadedPlugins[ $plugin ] ) ) {
00820             
00821             // Checks for dependancies
00822             if( isset( self::$_jQueryPluginsDeps[ $plugin ] ) ) {
00823                 
00824                 // Process each dependancy
00825                 foreach( self::$_jQueryPluginsDeps[ $plugin ] as $deps ) {
00826                     
00827                     // Includes the plugin
00828                     $this->_includeJQueryPlugin( $deps );
00829                 }
00830             }
00831             
00832             // Adds the JS script
00833             $this->_addJs( 'jquery/jquery' . $plugin . '.js' );
00834             
00835             // Script has been included
00836             self::$_jQueryLoadedPlugins[ $plugin ] = true;
00837         }
00838     }
00839     
00840     /**
00841      * 
00842      */
00843     public function menuConfig()
00844     {
00845         $this->MOD_MENU = array(
00846             'function' => $this->_getMenuItems()
00847         );
00848         
00849         parent::menuConfig();
00850     }
00851     
00852     /**
00853      * 
00854      */
00855     public function createModulePage()
00856     {
00857         parent::init();
00858         
00859         $this->_pageInfos = t3lib_BEfunc::readPageAccess(
00860             $this->id,
00861             $this->perms_clause
00862         );
00863         
00864         $access = is_array( $this->_pageInfos ) ? true : false;
00865         
00866         $this->doc = t3lib_div::makeInstance( 'template' );
00867         
00868         $this->doc->setModuleTemplate( $this->_extPath . 'res/html/mod' . $this->_moduleNumber . '.html' );
00869         
00870         $this->doc->backPath = $this->_backPath;
00871         
00872         $this->_buttons[ 'csh' ] = t3lib_BEfunc::cshItem(
00873             '_MOD_' . $this->_moduleSection . '_func',
00874             '',
00875             $this->_backPath
00876         );
00877         
00878         $this->_addButton( 'save', 'gfx/savedok.gif' );
00879         
00880         if( self::$_beUser->mayMakeShortcut() ) {
00881             
00882             $this->_buttons[ 'shortcut' ] = $this->doc->makeShortcutIcon(
00883                 '',
00884                 'function',
00885                 $this->_moduleName
00886             );
00887         }
00888         
00889         // Checks wether the current BE user can access this module
00890         if( ( $this->id && $access )
00891             || ( self::$_beUser->user[ 'admin' ] && !$this->id )
00892         ) {
00893             
00894             $contextMenuParts = $this->doc->getContextMenuCode();
00895             
00896             $this->doc->bodyTagAdditions = $contextMenuParts[ 1 ];
00897             
00898             // Creates the module's form tag
00899             $form                  = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'form' );
00900             $form[ 'action' ]      = '';
00901             $form[ 'method' ]      = 'post';
00902             $form[ 'enctype' ]     = self::$_t3Conf[ 'SYS' ][ 'form_enctype' ];
00903             $form[ 'name' ]        = $this->_moduleName . '_form';
00904             $form[ 'id' ]          = $this->_moduleName . '_form';
00905             
00906             $this->doc->form       = ( string )$form;
00907             
00908             $jsCode                = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'script' );
00909             $jsCode[ 'type' ]      = 'text/javascript';
00910             $jsCode[ 'charset' ]   = 'utf-8';
00911             $jsCodeData            = '// <![CDATA['
00912                                    . self::$_NL
00913                                    . 'var script_ended = 0;'
00914                                    . self::$_NL
00915                                    . 'function jumpToUrl( URL ) {'
00916                                    . self::$_NL
00917                                    . '    document.location = URL;'
00918                                    . self::$_NL
00919                                    . '}'
00920                                    . self::$_NL
00921                                    . '// ]]>';
00922             
00923             $jsCode->addTextData( $jsCodeData );
00924             
00925             $this->doc->JScode     = ( string )$jsCode . self::$_NL . $contextMenuParts[ 0 ];
00926             
00927             $postCode              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'script' );
00928             $postCode[ 'type' ]    = 'text/javascript';
00929             $postCode[ 'charset' ] = 'utf-8';
00930             
00931             // Adds some JavaScript code
00932             $postCodeData          = '// <![CDATA['
00933                                    . self::$_NL
00934                                    . 'script_ended = 1;'
00935                                    . self::$_NL
00936                                    . 'if( top.fsMod ) {'
00937                                    . self::$_NL
00938                                    . '    top.fsMod.recentIds[ \'' . $this->_moduleSection . '\' ] = 0;'
00939                                    . self::$_NL
00940                                    . '}'
00941                                    . self::$_NL
00942                                    . '// ]]>';
00943             
00944             $postCode->addTextData( $jsCodeData );
00945             
00946             $this->doc->postCode   = ( string )$postCode . self::$_NL . $contextMenuParts[ 2 ];
00947             
00948             $this->_content->comment( 'Start of module content' );
00949             
00950             $this->_getModuleContent( $this->_content->div );
00951             
00952             $this->_content->comment( 'End of module content' );
00953         }
00954     }
